# Dependencies
node_modules/

# Logs
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Build output
build/
dist/

# TypeScript generated files
*.js
*.d.ts
*.js.map

# Cache and coverage
.cache/
coverage/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Editor directories and files
.idea/
*.iml
.vscode/
*.swp

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Temporary and lock files
*.tmp
*.pid
*.seed
*.log
*.lock

# Testing-related files
*.test.ts.snap
*.test.tsx.snap

# Misc
/target/ # For any unintended overlap with Maven in the client
*.bak
*.swp
